name: liquor-locker
tagline: A simple app for tracking personal liquor and wine collections
description: Liquor Locker is a simple web app to manage personal wine or liquor collections. It supports bottle tracking, tagging, and notes, with a sleek modern UI built for self-hosting and personal consumption tracking.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Track bottles, Tagging system, Tasting notes. Organize your wine and spirits

features.title: Inventory Tracking
features.description: Bottle locations, Consumption history, Stock levels. Know what you have

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Clean design, Mobile-friendly, Easy to use. Beautiful collection management

features.title: Tasting Notes
features.description: Flavor profiles, Rating system, Personal reviews. Document your experiences

features.title: Bottle Details
features.description: Vintage information, Producer data, Purchase history. Complete bottle records

features.title: Location Tracking
features.description: Storage locations, Cellar organization, Quick lookup. Find bottles easily

features.title: Consumption History
features.description: Drinking log, Occasion notes, Date tracking. Remember special moments

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Advanced search, Category filters, Quick find. Navigate your collection
